channel.title: Question
channel.description: What do you guys want to see in a server?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

An admin that doesnt listen to his players about core features would be a good thing.
An admin that doesnt listen to his players anout trivial issues like pray drain rate etc would be a bad thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

Not like that has a noticeable effect on anything…

People will still play.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:8, topic:364830”][quote author=Motaro link=topic=461034.msg3375109#msg3375109 date=1287536482]
You (anyone) need to start a server with a main focus. Keep doing what you want to do.

If you lose focus… it kind of spirals out of control kind of like RSCE has done…

It was going good when it was an RSC clone.
[/quote]
Nah, you’re wrong… When we were doing little RSC like updates and replicating RSC all people did was bitch saying the game is 10 years old and they want new content. You add something like Runecrafting and they bitch 'cus it’s RS2.

It’s actually impossible to please them.[/quote]
Jesus Luke. You’re clueless…

No one actually CARED that you were putting the stuff in. They wanted it in, just not then and there.

We wanted the stuff we were PROMISED first to be put in. Not the stuff YOU wanted to put in first.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

[quote=“5 1, post:15, topic:364828”]Looks like someone plays RS2.

I thought\think Slayer = killed 1 certain type of npc x amount of times then you get a reward. And that equals killing lessers or greaters for an item, doesn’t it? Oh, sorry… Forgot you’re a retard.[/quote]

someones been buffing up on their rs2 knowledge , i played it till they took out pking n i really just assumed thats how slayer works. so sry rs2 fanboy, take it easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro

Don’t try to please everybody… just do whatever you want to. Pick a goal and follow through.

item.title: Question
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

[quote=“OldSkoolRSC, post:14, topic:364828”][quote author=5 1 link=topic=461034.msg3373485#msg3373485 date=1287425475]
Just an FYI, because you’re extermely ignorant…
For the 15th time, slayer basically = going to dragon maze, killing 10 dragons or 10 Lessers and trying to get rune.
[/quote]

mucho stupido, slayer is killing a certain number of different mobs to receive a seperate reward, not including any drops u recieved while running around like a little rs2 kid yelling yes! 1 kbd down, 2 more to go! Then ive got 20 lessers next, then 10 guards, 100 chickens, 50 men and im done, sweet![/quote]
Looks like someone plays RS2.

I thought\think Slayer = killed 1 certain type of npc x amount of times then you get a reward. And that equals killing lessers or greaters for an item, doesn’t it? Oh, sorry… Forgot you’re a retard.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @pljay03 pljay03
item.description:
@pljay03 wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:7, topic:364828”]I like how several post list active development/updates.
Then when someone changes somthing, they are like amg rs2.[/quote]
Without active development, you end up with RSCA, and look how that turned out.

I’m all for RS2-based updates, but I can also understand why someone would get peeved about it: they want to play RSC, not RS2. I have some good and original ideas, but I lack programming know-how so that sucks lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @pljay03 pljay03
item.description:
@pljay03 wrote:

Three things: stability, competent programmers, and active updates. You have that, and you have a successful server.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

[quote=“all day, post:2, topic:364828”]Active and up-front staff, no bullshit.

No favoritism.
Active development.
I want to play RSC not something that is trying to be up and beyond the game-play I used to love.[/quote]
I want botting to be obliterated
I want a server where i dont have to grind n farm n grind some more
I want a server that focuses entirely on player vs player combat

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @all_day All Day
item.description:
@all_day wrote:

Active and up-front staff, no bullshit.

No favoritism.
Active development.
I want to play RSC not something that is trying to be up and beyond the game-play I used to love.
I want botting to be the least of everyones worries, bots make the economy.
I want a server where I don’t have to spend 10 months getting flats 99’s and then it closes the next day.

There is a lot more, I’ll post some more “I wants” later.

Read full topic
